title: VR-Based Instructional Design Strategy for Post-Pandemic Mathematics Education Recovery

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics and Data Interpretation Skills, Fundamental Digital Device Utilization
context.additional_context: Customized education to restore workplace mathematical application skills, considering accelerated digital transformation post-pandemic

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related math problems (budget allocation, risk calculation) with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments.
Learners can design data visualization and decision-making processes using digital tools in three or more stages.
Learners can explain two or more effective self-directed learning strategies in post-pandemic educational environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
